general.name: mos_target_guvcat
general.description: GALEX unique source catalog from Bianchi et al. 2017 (https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-4365/aa7053/pdf). For more details on the column descriptions see https://archive.stsci.edu/hlsp/guvcat/guvcat-column-description

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_guvcat-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

photoextractid.name: PHOTOEXTRACTID
photoextractid.description: Pointer to GALEX photoExtract Table (identifier of original observation)

avaspra.name: AVASPRA
avaspra.description: R.A. of center of field where object was measured

avaspdec.name: AVASPDEC
avaspdec.description: Declination of center of field where object was measured

subvisit.name: SUBVISIT
subvisit.description: Number of subvisit if exposure was divided

fov_radius.name: FOV_RADIUS
fov_radius.description: Distance of source from center of the field in which it was measured

e_bv.name: E_BV
e_bv.description: E(B-V) Galactic reddening from Schlegel et al. 1998 maps)

istherespectrum.name: ISTHERESPECTRUM
istherespectrum.description: Does this object have a GALEX spectrum?

fuv_magerr_auto.name: FUV_MAGERR_AUTO
fuv_magerr_auto.description: FUV rms error for AUTO magnitude

nuv_magerr_auto.name: NUV_MAGERR_AUTO
nuv_magerr_auto.description: NUV rms error for AUTO magnitude

fuv_fwhm_image.name: FUV_FWHM_IMAGE
fuv_fwhm_image.description: FUV FWHM assuming a Gaussian core

nuv_fwhm_image.name: NUV_FWHM_IMAGE
nuv_fwhm_image.description: NUV FWHM assuming a Gaussian core

fuv_fwhm_world.name: FUV_FWHM_WORLD
fuv_fwhm_world.description: FUV FWHM assuming a Gaussian core (WORLD units)

nuv_fwhm_world.name: NUV_FWHM_WORLD
nuv_fwhm_world.description: NUV FWHM assuming a Gaussian core (WORLD units)

nuv_errtheta_j2000.name: NUV_ERRTHETA_J2000
nuv_errtheta_j2000.description: NUV position angle error (east of north) (J2000)

fuv_errtheta_j2000.name: FUV_ERRTHETA_J2000
fuv_errtheta_j2000.description: FUV position angle error (east of north) (J2000)

nuv_kron_radius.name: NUV_KRON_RADIUS
nuv_kron_radius.description: NUV Kron apertures in units of A or B

nuv_a_world.name: NUV_A_WORLD
nuv_a_world.description: NUV profile rms along major axis (world units)

nuv_b_world.name: NUV_B_WORLD
nuv_b_world.description: NUV profile rms along minor axis (world units)

fuv_kron_radius.name: FUV_KRON_RADIUS
fuv_kron_radius.description: FUV Kron apertures in units of A or B

fuv_a_world.name: FUV_A_WORLD
fuv_a_world.description: FUV profile rms along major axis (world units)

fuv_b_world.name: FUV_B_WORLD
fuv_b_world.description: FUV profile rms along minor axis (world units)

nuv_weight.name: NUV_WEIGHT
nuv_weight.description: NUV effective exposure (flat-field response value) at the source position

fuv_weight.name: FUV_WEIGHT
fuv_weight.description: FUV effective exposure (flat-field response value) at the source position

sep.name: SEP
sep.description: Separation between the FUV and NUV position of the source in the same observation

nuv_poserr.name: NUV_POSERR
nuv_poserr.description: Position error of the source in the NUV image

fuv_poserr.name: FUV_POSERR
fuv_poserr.description: Position error of the source in the FUV image

corv.name: CORV
corv.description: Whether the source comes from a coadd or visit

grank.name: GRANK
grank.description: rank of source with 2.5 arcsec of primary

ngrank.name: NGRANK
ngrank.description: If this is a primary, the number of sources within 2.5 arcsec

groupgid.name: GROUPGID
groupgid.description: OBJID's of all AIS sources within 2.5 arcseconds concatenated by a "+"

grankdist.name: GRANKDIST
grankdist.description: Same for GRANK, but based on distance criterion

ngrankdist.name: NGRANKDIST
ngrankdist.description: Same for NGRANK, but based on distance criterion

primgiddist.name: PRIMGIDDIST
primgiddist.description: Same for PRIMGID, but based on distance criterion

groupgiddist.name: GROUPGIDDIST
groupgiddist.description: Same for GROUPGID, but based on distance criterion

groupgidtot.name: GROUPGIDTOT
groupgidtot.description: OBJID's of all sources within 2.5 arcseconds

difffuv.name: DIFFFUV
difffuv.description: FUV magnitude difference between primary and secondary

diffnuv.name: DIFFNUV
diffnuv.description: NUV magnitude difference between primary and secondary

difffuvdist.name: DIFFFUVDIST
difffuvdist.description: FUV magnitude difference between primary and secondary, but based on distance criterion

diffnuvdist.name: DIFFNUVDIST
diffnuvdist.description: NUV magnitude difference between primary and secondary, but based on distance criterion

sepasdist.name: SEPASDIST
sepasdist.description: Separation between primary and secondary, but based on distance criterion

inlargeobj.name: INLARGEOBJ
inlargeobj.description: Is source in the footprint of an extended object?
